immigration.title: Immigration Law
immigration.shortDescription: Navigate Canada's immigration system with confidence.
immigration.description: Our immigration practice helps individuals and families achieve their Canadian dreams. We provide expert guidance through all stages of the immigration process, including economic immigration, family sponsorship, humanitarian programs, and temporary stays.

expressEntry.title: Express Entry
expressEntry.description: Federal Skilled Worker Program (FSWP), Federal Skilled Trades Program (FSTP), and Canadian Experience Class (CEC).

pnp.title: Provincial Nominee Program (PNP)
pnp.description: Provincial nominations for candidates with skills needed in specific regions, including Quebec programs.

business.title: Business Immigration
business.description: Programs for investors, entrepreneurs, and self-employed individuals looking to establish in Canada.

judicialReview.title: Judicial Review
judicialReview.description: Federal Court review of immigration and refugee decisions, including appeals of refused applications and protection claims.

immigrationAppeals.title: Immigration Appeals
immigrationAppeals.description: Appeals to the Immigration Appeal Division (IAD) including sponsorship refusals, removal orders, and residency obligation decisions.

familySponsorship.title: Family Class Sponsorship
familySponsorship.description: Sponsor spouses, partners, children, parents, grandparents, and other eligible relatives for permanent residence.

humanitarian.title: Humanitarian & Refugee Programs
humanitarian.description: Protection for individuals seeking asylum in Canada and refugee claimant support.

workPermits.title: Work Permits
workPermits.description: Temporary work permits including LMIA-based permits, open work permits, and employer-specific permits.

studyPermits.title: Study Permits
studyPermits.description: Permits for international students, post-graduation work permits, and study extensions.

visitorVisas.title: Visitor Visas
visitorVisas.description: Temporary resident visas for tourism, family visits, business trips, and super visas for parents/grandparents.

citizenship.title: Canadian Citizenship
citizenship.description: Citizenship applications, test preparation, and ceremony guidance.

prCardRenewal.title: PR Card Renewal
prCardRenewal.description: Permanent resident card renewals, replacements, and travel document applications.

familyLaw.title: Family Law
familyLaw.description: We provide sensitive, skilled representation in all family law matters, helping you navigate difficult times with dignity and clarity.

smallClaims.title: Small Claims
smallClaims.description: We represent clients in Small Claims Court, helping resolve disputes efficiently and cost-effectively.

debtRecovery.title: Debt Recovery
debtRecovery.description: Collection of outstanding debts and unpaid invoices.

contractDisputes.title: Contract Disputes
contractDisputes.description: Breach of contract claims and defenses.

propertyDamage.title: Property Damage
propertyDamage.description: Claims for damage to personal or real property.

consumerDisputes.title: Consumer Disputes
consumerDisputes.description: Issues with goods, services, or warranties.

landlordTenant.title: Landlord & Tenant
landlordTenant.shortDescription: Protecting your rights in rental matters.
landlordTenant.description: Whether you're a landlord or tenant, we provide expert guidance on residential tenancy issues and represent clients before the Landlord and Tenant Board.

ltb.title: LTB Proceedings
ltb.description: Representation at Landlord and Tenant Board hearings.

lease.title: Lease Agreements
lease.description: Drafting and reviewing residential lease agreements.

rent.title: Rent Disputes
rent.description: Rent arrears, increases, and above-guideline applications.

notaryPublic.title: Notary Public
notaryPublic.description: Our notary public services ensure your documents are properly authenticated and legally valid.

authentication.title: Document Authentication
authentication.description: Notarization for domestic and international use.
